Company: Advance America Cash Advance Centers, Inc.
Agency: Labor Department Wage and Hour Division
Info Source: March 7, 2017 download of a dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_summary.php
Notes: Date and year are the Findings End Date in the dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division, which does not provide case opening or closing dates. The company name is the Legal Name provided by the dataset unless that field is blank, in which case the Trade Name is used. The dataset provides only one address and does not indicate whether it is the company headquarters address or the establishment address. The penalty amount is the total of civil monetary penalties and mandated back wages. The original dataset provides a breakdown.

Company: Advance America, Cash Advance Centers of California, LLC
Description: Advance America agreed to pay $297,486 in penalties, refunds, costs and forgiven fees in settlement of allegations it violated the California Deferred Deposit Transaction Law by collecting unauthorized fees.
Agency: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation

Company: Advance America, Cash Advance Centers of California, LLC
Description: Advance America agreed to pay $160,000 in penalties and refunds in settlement of allegations it violated the California Deferred Deposit Transaction Law by using unlicensed lead generators and collecting unauthorized fees.
Agency: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation

Company: ADVANCE AMERICA, CASH ADVANCE CENTERS OF ALABAMA LLC
NAICS Translation: 522390: Other Activities Related to Credit Intermediation
